channel.title: Good Source?
channel.description:
Not Sure if this is the right Thread, But since it said "Help" I'll go ahead and ask, What would be a decent 700+ Source to use, For me to get the hang of these New "Updated" Sources, Worked will with 317s and 508s Want something new, and most sources I've used Revision 700+ Were very odd, Any good Recommendations? Any help is appreciated!
Also Move this to the Correct thread if this isn't the right one.

item.title: Good Source?
item.dc:creator: @Potzon Potzon
item.description:
@Potzon wrote:

[quote=“thakillah, post:5, topic:515567”][quote author=Potzon link=topic=633823.msg4284178#msg4284178 date=1366126431]
If you’re looking for a 718+ server, I guess I’d suggest Matrix.
Oh well, all the 718+ RSPS’s are based on Matrix… So It doesn’t really matter which one you take.
[/quote]

they all suck lol[/quote]
What about the original Matrix release?
I think it’s pretty good.

Read full topic
